text: Wid, segwen, ur nezmir ara ad a$en tieuoiyn iumnen, ad a$en si teklatin nnwen, tid iumnen. Oebbi Yif akw akken Ieoa liman nnwen. Wa seg wa. A$et pent, s tsrie n twacult nnsent, fket asent arrazen nnsent, s lqanun. D tizedganin, macci d tucmitin, ne$ d tid iff$en abrid. UMa u$alent d tieuoiyn, sinna xedment laao, aaaqeb nnsent azgen n win n tieuoiyn. Akka i win, segwen, ippagwaden abekkav. Ma tueboem, ppif i kunwi. Oebbi Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
